name: idleness
content:
idleness noun [U]
(NOT WORKING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of not working or being used: They live in an enforced idleness. Jumping into an exercise routine after weeks of idleness can cause muscle soreness.
UK the state of being without work: After a year of forced idleness, she found work. Hundreds were thrown into idleness when the factory closed.
More examplesFewer examplesThe forced idleness of the men on the street corners seemed like a prison sentence to them.A little idleness could indeed be a fine thing.
